Dorothea Norton

  1. Foster Name: Dorothy
  2. Foster Family: Joseph and Mary Wemhoff
  3. Location of Family: Humphrey, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1918-XX-XX, NY
  8. Date of Death: 11/25/2004
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Dorothy Sharpley
  11. Spouse Name: Clyde Sharpley
  12. Source: Crossroads, June 1999, p. 24-27; Crossroads, 1st Quarter 2005, p. 18-19; Crossroads, 4th quarter 2004, back page; Social Security Death Index; National Orphan Train Complex; OTR, vol 6.
